description: Contains the tests for this In Basket message.

columns.name: MSG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the In Basket message record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: LAB_TEST_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the test information for this In Basket message. The test information here is the tests selected on the specimen (I OVS 36).
